metadata.title: CVE-2024-7537 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - high
metadata.description: oFono QMI SMS Handling Out-Of-Bounds Read Information DisclosureVulnerability. This vulnerability allows local attackers to disclosesensitive information on affected installations of oFono. Authentication isnot required to exploit this vulnerability.The specific flaw exists within the processing of SMS message lists. Theissue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data,which can result in a read past the end of an allocated buffer. An attackercan leverage this in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to executearbitrary code in the context of root. Was ZDI-CAN-23157.

criterions.comment: ofono package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
